metadata.code: National Building Code of Canada 2023 - Alberta Edition

requirements.description: Dimensions of rooms or spaces shall be measured between finished wall surfaces and between finished floor and ceiling surfaces
requirements.exact_quote: dimensions of rooms or spaces shall be measured between finished wall surfaces and between finished floor and ceiling surfaces

requirements.description: Opening between areas for combination room must be larger of 3 m² or 40% of wall area on dependent side
requirements.exact_quote: opening between the areas occupies the larger of 3 m² or 40% or more of the area of the wall measured on the side of the dependent area

requirements.description: Every building shall be designed in conformance with Section 3.8 (Barrier-Free Design)
requirements.exact_quote: every building shall be designed in conformance with Section 3.8

requirements.description: Barrier-free path not required when floor elevation difference between entrance and all dwelling units exceeds 600mm
requirements.exact_quote: barrier-free path of travel...need not be provided where the difference in floor elevation between the entrance level and every dwelling unit exceeds 600mm

articles.title: Ceiling Heights of Rooms or Spaces

requirements.description: Living room or space minimum ceiling height
Dining room or space minimum ceiling height
Kitchen or kitchen space minimum ceiling height
Master bedroom or bedroom space minimum ceiling height

requirements.exact_quote: Unfinished basement including laundry area therein: 2.0m

requirements.description: Bathroom, water-closet room or laundry above grade minimum ceiling height
requirements.exact_quote: Bathroom, water-closet room or laundry area above grade: 2.1m

requirements.description: Passage, hall or main entrance vestibule minimum ceiling height
requirements.exact_quote: Passage, hall or main entrance vestibule: 2.1m
Ceiling heights in secondary suites shall be not less than 1.95m

requirements.description: Secondary suite clear height under beams and ducting
requirements.exact_quote: Clear heights under beams and ducting in secondary suites shall be not less than 1.85m

requirements.description: Ceiling height above and below mezzanine floor assembly (non-residential)
requirements.exact_quote: ceiling height above and below a mezzanine floor assembly in occupancies other than residential occupancies shall be not less than 2.1m
clear height in a storage garage shall be not less than 2m

requirements.description: Unobstructed hallway width within dwelling unit
requirements.exact_quote: unobstructed width of a hallway within a dwelling unit shall be not less than 860mm

requirements.description: Reduced hallway width permitted when only bedrooms/bathrooms at end and second exit provided
requirements.exact_quote: hallway width is permitted to be 710mm where there are only bedrooms and bathrooms at the end of the hallway furthest from the living area, and a second exit is provided
